concept.title: IBM StoredIQ Desktop Data Collector
concept.shortdesc: IBM StoredIQ Desktop Data Collector indexes desktops as volumes. The volumes appear in IBM StoredIQ Data Server and in IBM StoredIQ Administrator, where they can be used like any other data source.

conbody.note: The IBM StoredIQ Desktop Data Collector is also referred to as the desktop client.
conbody.p: The data server maintains an index using the information sent by the desktop client. After indexing, desktops - even offline or unreachable ones - can be viewed, searched, or targeted for later policy action.
